game.name: Sky Warrior 2 Invasion
game.description:
The biggest adventure fun has come to your home today! Your army base has been captured by a horde of enemy planes. You will be asked to operate a plane by your government to destroy all enemy planes and take some people out from there. Would you be able to play the role of a pilot and rescue people? Join Sky Warrior 2 game to eliminate as many enemy aircraft and fighters and grab multiple improvements! You are much skilled to handle this task on your own. Get up and take this challenge!

A huge area has been invaded by a large number of enemies in this highly addicting and exciting flight game. But, who cares? You are a brave warrior who also knows very well how to destroy your fighters by showing your intense fighting moves in this aeroplane shooting game. Collect stars, missiles, ammunition, life, fuel and multiple improvements and keep destroying all the enemy fighters and aircrafts! Be careful and pilot a war helicopter in this html5 adventure game!

Apart from destroying the aircrafts of your enemies, you would also have to save people who have huge faith on your air fighting abilities. Use the arrow keys to move your plane upward, downward, left and right! Your plane will keep shooting automatically. The biggest air warfare has just begun. So, take your seat on your plane now and be prepared to avoid the hindrances and dangers and shoot your enemies to complete your mission in this free online war game that is playable on multiple devices, no download required.
